snippet: Kenyan President Uhuru Kenyatta, in Washington this week to court Western investors, has sought to downplay a spate of violent attacks tied to militants in neighboring Somalia and their impact on Kenya's economy....

headline.print_headline: Kenya Downplays Security Risks as It Courts U.S. Investment
headline.main: Kenya Downplays Security Risks as It Courts U.S. Investment

lead_paragraph: Kenyan President Uhuru Kenyatta, in Washington this week to court Western investors, has sought to downplay a spate of violent attacks tied to militants in neighboring Somalia and their impact on Kenya's economy.
